channel.title: [562] Chaging exp rates
channel.description:
Hey, I wanted to change the exp rates on my 562 server, as in like more exp per hit. I searched some tutorials, but most of them are on 317's and i dont have a client.java in my server files. If anyone help i will very much appreciated it!
Thanks!

item.title: [562] Chaging exp rates
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

1.download notepad++
http://notepad-plus-plus.org/

2.Go ctrl+f in your base folder with all the .java’s

3.Search all folders for “.java”

4.Select all of them (ctrl+A) and right click, select “edit with notepad++”

5.Hit ctrl+f inside notepad++ and search for the current exp rate

6.Examine all values until correct one is found

Read full topic
